name: The Life of a Frog
description:
The Life of a Frog was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 79: Frogs in Godot Engine

In your adventure you'll need to fight flies, swim in the ponds and lay eggs. You'll do what a good frog does. 

Controls:

w, s, a, d/arrows - movement

left click on fly to fight it (you can't fight the if you're in water)

f11 for fullscreen (recommended)

f12 for muting audio (propably recommended)

You need to be fed well enough for you babies to grow, and you also don't want to dry out.

once Egg development is on 100% go into shallow waters and continue your species

How did i fit the limitation?

It's basically a frog rpg about frog's life and life is just one big level.

Linux and MacOS builds are untested so please tell me how they do/do not work
